original_text: But thou shalt die in peace: and with the burnings of thy fathers, the former kings which were before thee, so shall they burn odours for thee; and they will lament thee, saying, Ah lord! for I have pronounced the word, saith the Lord.
korean_text: 평안히 죽을 것이며 사람이 너보다 먼저 있은 네 조상들 곧 선왕들에게 분향하던 것 같이 네게 분향하며 너를 위하여 애통하기를 슬프다 주여 하리니 이는 내가 말하였음이라 여호와의 말씀이니라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: But thou shalt die in peace:
and with the burnings of thy fathers,
the former kings which were before thee,
so shall they burn odours for thee;
and they will lament thee, saying,
for I have pronounced the word,
